range_finset_basis:
@[simp]
theorem range_finset_basis [is_noetherian K V] : Set.range (finset_basis K V) = basis.of_vector_space_index K V := by
  rw [finset_basis, basis.range_reindex, basis.range_of_vector_space]
#align range_finset_basis range_finset_basis
iff_fg:
/-- A module over a division ring is noetherian if and only if it is finitely generated. -/
theorem iff_fg : is_noetherian K V ↔ module.finite K V :=
  by
  constructor
  · intro h
    exact
      ⟨⟨finset_basis_index K V, by
          convert (finset_basis K V).span_eq
          simp⟩⟩
  · rintro ⟨s, hs⟩
    rw [is_noetherian.iff_dim_lt_aleph_0, ← dim_top, ← hs]
    exact lt_of_le_of_lt (dim_span_le _) s.finite_to_set.lt_aleph_0
#align iff_fg iff_fg
iff_dim_lt_aleph_0:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2019 Chris Hughes. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Chris Hughes
-/
/-- A module over a division ring is noetherian if and only if
its dimension (as a cardinal) is strictly less than the first infinite cardinal `ℵ₀`.
-/
theorem iff_dim_lt_aleph_0 : is_noetherian K V ↔ module.rank K V < cardinal.aleph_0 :=
  by
  let b := basis.of_vector_space K V
  rw [← b.mk_eq_dim'', lt_aleph_0_iff_set_finite]
  constructor
  · intro
    exact finite_of_linear_independent (basis.of_vector_space_index.linear_independent K V)
  · intro hbfinite
    refine' @is_noetherian_of_linear_equiv K («expr⊤» : submodule K V) V _ _ _ _ _ (linear_equiv.of_top _ rfl) (id _)
    refine' is_noetherian_of_fg_of_noetherian _ ⟨set.finite.to_finset hbfinite, _⟩
    rw [set.finite.coe_to_finset, ← b.span_eq, basis.coe_of_vector_space, Subtype.range_coe]
#align iff_dim_lt_aleph_0 iff_dim_lt_aleph_0
finite_basis_index:
/-- In a noetherian module over a division ring,
if a basis is indexed by a set, that set is finite. -/
theorem finite_basis_index {ι : Type _} {s : set ι} [is_noetherian K V] (b : basis s K V) : s.finite :=
  b.finite_index_of_dim_lt_aleph_0 (dim_lt_aleph_0 K V)
#align finite_basis_index finite_basis_index
dim_lt_aleph_0:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/-- The dimension of a noetherian module over a division ring, as a cardinal,
is strictly less than the first infinite cardinal `ℵ₀`. -/
theorem dim_lt_aleph_0 : ∀ [is_noetherian K V], module.rank K V < cardinal.aleph_0 :=
  is_noetherian.iff_dim_lt_aleph_0.1
#align dim_lt_aleph_0 dim_lt_aleph_0
coe_sort_finset_basis_index:
@[simp]
theorem coe_sort_finset_basis_index [is_noetherian K V] :
    (finset_basis_index K V : Type _) = basis.of_vector_space_index K V :=
  set.finite.coe_sort_to_finset _
#align coe_sort_finset_basis_index coe_sort_finset_basis_index
coe_finset_basis_index:
@[simp]
theorem coe_finset_basis_index [is_noetherian K V] :
    (↑(finset_basis_index K V) : set V) = basis.of_vector_space_index K V :=
  set.finite.coe_to_finset _
#align coe_finset_basis_index coe_finset_basis_index
